title: Gene Ontology (GO) Enrichment Analysis Bar Chart - Multi-Panel Faceted Visualization
description: Recreation of a Gene Ontology enrichment analysis horizontal bar chart showing significantly enriched terms across three categories: Biological Process (BP), Cellular Component (CC), and Molecular Function (MF). The visualization uses -log10(p-value) on the x-axis and color-codes bars by q-value (FDR-adjusted p-value) using a blue-to-red gradient.
figure_type: Faceted horizontal bar chart with gradient color encoding
visualization_features: Color gradient representing q-value (blue=high significance, red=low significance)
key_findings: Top enriched terms include osteoblast proliferation regulation (BP), cell-cell junction (CC), and glycosaminoglycan binding (MF)
